strapiPost.title: Heartland Forward releases economic recovery strategy
strapiPost.content:
Heartland Forward released a 7 point plan for post-COVID-19 economic recovery in the Northwest Arkansas region.

  • Background – Heartland Forward, an institute for economic renewal, is “a nonpartisan non-profit, think and do tank” based in Bentonville, Arkansas. Their goal is to “improve economic performance in the center of the United States” otherwise known as the Heartland.
  • Yesterday they released their NWA Economic Recovery Strategy for the region following Covid-19.
  • Deep Dive – to read more about their efforts undertaken and recommendations for the challenges and opportunities facing the region, you can find more HERE
